Author: kavinkul, Blananas2
Description: Find out which wire is needed to be cut first, then use the display number to figure out the second wire needed to be cut. Tags: 7-wires, 2-digit, 7-segment-display, 2-stages, 8-colors
Name: Thinking Wires

Souvenir.Explanation: The module, once solved, hides all the relevant information including wires and display. Souvenir can ask questions about the cut wires or the display numbers.
